Job Title: Assistant Golf Professional

Location: Castle Rock, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
The Ridge at Castle Pines is excited to announce the exceptional career opportunities of Associate Golf Professional. Qualified candidates will thrive in a hospitality environment and be highly focused on providing superior service.

General Responsibilities:

The position will assist the Director of Golf and Head Golf Professional in the management of day-to-day golf operations of the facility. Experience in instruction, club fitting, golf shop merchandise operations and tournament operations are important. This person will be an active ambassador for an exceptional golf experience.

Salary: $35,000

Specific Responsibilities:

Assist the Director of Golf in overseeing the management and performance of all golf shop and applicable department operations and services; assure high standards and total customer satisfaction. Assist with management of Outside Operations Staff to ensure the highest quality of customer service is achieved. Assist with the administration of applicable staff via recordkeeping, work schedules, etc. in accordance with facility human resource policies and state and federal labor laws. Facilitate a professionally manage tournament operation. Coordinate tournament operations and weekly events for men’s and women’s programs including planning, pre-tournament operations, post- tournament billing, promotion, course set-up, preparation, scoring, prize distribution, and follow up. Coordinate course set-up with Superintendent including tee markers hole locations, rough height, green speed, special contests, etc. Assist with fee collection and managing play in a non-tee time environment; directing the flow of traffic on the course, enforcing facility rules, assisting customers with course etiquette, alerting management to any golf course problems, promoting the facility and its events and assisting players with any on-course problems. Oversee and enforce golf shop operations policies, procedures, controls, and fee structures to ensure the safekeeping of assets, inventory and resources. Assist in the inventory control of hard goods, soft goods, and special orders including: ordering procedures, receiving procedures, inputting into point of sale, pricing procedures, display, and salesTrains, motivates and develops Golf Shop staff to ensure effective sales and service performance and techniques and product knowledge. Assist with all opening and closing procedures. Conduct individual lessons and group clinics, as applicable. Play golf with a variety of Members in competitive and non-competitive situations. Conduct oneself in a professional manner and maintain a professional image at all times

Qualifications:

3-5 years of experience as an Assistant Professional preferred. The successful candidate must be very visible, easily approachable, pro-active in nature, and possess a strong desire to learn the skills necessary to become a Head Golf Professional. Fundamental knowledge of the game of golf, rules of golf, golf facility operations and tournament operationsExperienced computer user including; Microsoft Word and Excel. Proficient in other applications, i.e. email, internet, tournament software and databases. 

Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree (BA/BS) preferredPGM Graduate preferredPGA Class “A” Preferred

Benefits:

Medical PlansPrescription PlanCritical Illness InsuranceAccident Injury InsuranceHospital Care InsuranceDental InsuranceVision InsuranceWellness SupportHealth Savings AccountFlexible Spending AccountsBasic Life and AD&D InsuranceVoluntary Short-Term Disability InsuranceIdentity Theft InsuranceEmployee Assistance & Wellness Support Program401(k)Pet InsuranceLegal ServicesHoliday Pay

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
